altername_name: Left Brain, Right Brain: Use Both Hands, Train Both Sides
Left Brain Right Brain: Hand Training: Derecha vs Izquierda
name: Left Brain Right Brain
overview: Are you a righty or a lefty? What if you could be both? With Left Brain, Right Brain, you can hone your mental skills to become truly ambidextrous. While training your hands with speed based DS Mini-games, you'll also be training the left and right hemispheres of your brain. It's like two games in one!
